text: CCTV-4 is a Chinese free-to-air television channel. It is one of six China Central Television channels that broadcasts outside the People's Republic of China. == Programmes == * CCTV New Year's Gala * China's Public Opinion Field * Across China * Traditional Chinese Medicine * Our Chinese Heart * China Showbiz * China News * Xinwen Lianbo * Journey to Civilization * Foreigner in China * Tian Ya Gong Ci Shi * Sports on Line * Happy Chinese * Asia Today * Focus Today * Chinese World * Beloved Family ==References== Category:Television channels in Asia Category:1990s establishments in China
title: CCTV-4
